definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
a human rights activist/a fighter for human rights
an environmental activist/a fighter for environmental protection

sentences.english: Achieved Vicious Gladiator title. Achieved Ruthle Gladiator title.
sentences.chinese: 获得头衔“暴蓝田墨玉怒角斗士”。

sentences.english: Still having rare Lu Da , god fighter mostly has the recall cherished by her .
sentences.chinese: 还有希路达，神斗士大都有被她爱护的回忆。

sentences.english: M. considered himself a battler, a fighter.
sentences.chinese: 仍将自己看作是一个战斗者，斗士。

sentences.english: Pebbled leather gladiator sandals in black.
sentences.chinese: 鹅卵石皮革黑角斗士凉鞋。

sentences.english: You are a fighter, so just hang in there.
Events have imbued the Japanese corporate warrior with a new insouciance.
sentences.chinese: 当初日本公司的斗士已经变得满不在乎。

sentences.english: Gladiator-inspired sandals are made of reptile-embossed synthetic leather.
sentences.chinese: 角斗士的灵感凉鞋的爬行动物压花合成革。

sentences.english: Aha, a "melancholy" and brave warrior, I like this word.
sentences.chinese: 哈，“忧”勇斗士，我喜欢这个字。

sentences.english: Only out of such rugged fibre were successful fighters fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样坚韧的材料，才能创造出成功的斗士。

sentences.english: Attacked fraud busters awarded only 2600 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 打假斗士方舟子被袭只获2600元赔偿。

sentences.english: Happy love, so that the tension of the fighter relaxed down.
sentences.chinese: 美满的爱情，使斗士紧绷的心情松弛下来。

sentences.english: That is the true gladiator feeling.
sentences.chinese: 这是真正的斗士的气魄。

sentences.english: Different Judgments in the parties is difficult to judge in Linggang fighters or clowns ?
sentences.chinese: 各方褒贬不一难评判于凌罡是斗士还是小丑？

sentences.english: Long before entering the ring, Laila was a fighter.
sentences.chinese: 早在走进拳坛前，莱拉就是一名斗士。

sentences.english: A blush mantled over the bronzed cheek of the gladiator.
sentences.chinese: 斗士古铜色的脸膛顿时涨得通红。

sentences.english: Bring out your inner she-warrior in these edgy ensembles.
sentences.chinese: 这些整体上的不安衬托出你内心的前卫斗士。

definition: berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
mythological figure (such as the Grim Reaper) in charge of taking the souls of those who die/(fig.) death
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
